Hi, I'm Kamisama666.

This is my personal blog. Here I will post all kind of things related to IT Systems, programming, hacking, GNU/Linux and much more. This is my way of retribute to the Internet community a small part of what It have gave me. Also, you can find my code projects in my github account. If you want to contact me, send me a message to my email or take a look at my awesome linkedIn profile. Live long and prosper.

Wintermute

29 June 2014

Live long and prosper

I will be brief. I'm Kamisama666. Of course, this is not my real name. And not, It's not a reference to Dragon Ball (even if I love that show). It doesn't means anything in special. It's simply the nickname I use on Internet. If you want to know my real name, just visit my LinkedIn profile. I also have a github page where I publish my code. For any question, petition or insult, send me a message to my email.

I've started this blog for different reasons: To share my ideas and research with the community, to have a place for notes and to improve my english (I'm from Spain).

For that reason, the contents of that blog are very likely to be a little messy. But, in general, those are some of the topics that I have preference for:

  • IT systems administration and configuration
  • Networking
  • Programming
  • Web developing
  • Hacking and pentesting
  • Linux
  • Free software

As a final note, this blog is powered by the Jekyll static site generator, the Hikari theme (with some style changes by me) and Github pages.

Live long and prosper
